products.sum_assured: P10,000-P50,000 (varies by package) + additional benefits for Comprehensive Plan
key_features: Two plan options: Basic and Comprehensive
Family cover: policyholder, spouse, up to 6 children
Double accidental death benefit for policyholder
Comprehensive Plan includes Grocery Benefit (P3,000) and Tombstone Benefit (P3,000)
Optional cover for parents/parents-in-law (max 4) and extended family (max 6)
Cover continues for life (no age limit) for policyholder, spouse, parents
Children covered up to age 21 (or 25 if student)
products.exclusions: Suicide within first 24 months; death due to war, invasion, hostilities, riot, terrorism; death while under influence of alcohol/illegal drugs; death during criminal activity; effects of radioactivity/nuclear explosion; death from hazardous sports or private flying
